channel.title: Smart Markers feature in Aspose.Cells on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Smart Markers feature in Aspose.Cells on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Grouping Data in Aspose.Cells
item.description: In some Excel reports you might need to break the data into groups to make it easier to read and analyze. One of the primary purposes for breaking data into groups is to run calculations (perform summary operations) on each group of records. Aspose.Cells smart markers allow you to group your data by field(s) and place summary rows in between data sets or data groups. For example, if grouping data by Customers.

item.title: Image Markers in Aspose.Cells
item.description: Aspose.Cells smart markers support image markers too. This section shows you how to insert pictures using smart markers. Image Parameters Smart marker parameters for managing images. Picture:FitToCell - Auto-fit the image to the cellâ€™s row height and column width. Picture:ScaleN - Scale height and width to N percent. Picture:Width:Nin&Height:Nin - Render the image N inches high and N inches wide. You can also sepecify Left and Top positions (in points).
